0.title: YOUR BIRTHDAY HOROSCOPE
clues: November 16:People of this sign, don't get stung by being too aggressive
March 25:Mars may rule this fire sign known for great athletes, but no one else does!  Also, bet heavy on the Rams
October 3:Your peacemaking abilities will bring everyone together!  This air sign's life is in balance today!
Nov. 26:Though normally you're warm & relaxed, this sign is all a-quiver with joy today!  Shoot for the stars!
August 28:Deal with dichotomy today, as this sign is a symbol of fertility but famed for its chastity

1.title: PRESIDENTIAL ARTIFACTS
clues: His library & museum has a sculpture of him as the Sphinx
Truman kept a sign with this 4-word motto on his Oval Office desk; the original sign is at his presidential library
Marshal Zhukov presented Eisenhower with the Order of Victory, a military decoration of this colorful army

2.title: "U" TUBE
clues: In London the subway is called "the Tube" or this subterranean term
You can get a tube for priority or express mail from the organization with this 4-letter abbreviation

Alleged sightings of these include a cigar-shaped one reported in 1991 by airline pilot Achille Zaghetti

3.title: THE SPORTING LIFE
clues: In the 1980s college students were combining football & plastic throwing discs to create this "ultimate" sport

Named in honor of one of its former commissioners, the Larry O'Brien Trophy goes to the champion of this pro league
